Question: Sumavision CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sumavision

Product: CES 2024 Highlights

- EMR 3.0, EMR 4.0, D8220 for Contribution & Distribution Solution
- SDM, EMR 3.0, Streaming IP Gateway for Transcoding Processing Solution
- IPQAM 3.3, 10K511N, 10K511X for Modulation Solution
- CDN, Smart BO, Launcher for IPTV & OTT
- CAS, DRM for Content Security
- UHD Portable Encoder1RU UHD Encoder/Decoder for Live & Sports Over IP
- SMPTE ST 2110/2022-6, JPEG-XSNMOS for IP Gateway Workflow
- MDT 8100/8200 for Studio Central Management
- RMD/RPDRMD Controller for DAA Solution
- RMD, CPE, ONU for Hospitality
- DAA & R-OLT Node for DOCSIS and PON Hybrid Solution
- Indoor & Outdoor OLT for FTTH Solution
